meanings: (서류를 받아서 처리함) accept, receive, take up

vlive.korean: 수리비 플렉스입니다! This is repair cost FLEX! 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 🐯🎂💖✌️
[소원 수리함에 필요한 것을 적어주세요!] 뭐 먹고 싶어? [Write whatever you need] What do you want to eat? 듣기 View video 몬스타엑스의 지금은 휴가중 : MONSTA X's on Vacation EP-1
vlive.english: [Write whatever you need] What do you want to eat?

vlive.korean: 수리했어요! I fixed it! 듣기 View video CIX : CIX HYUNSUK BIRTHDAY V LIVE
같이 한다고요 수리를? - 수리하신다고요? We're going to repair it? - You're repairing it? 듣기 View video N.Flying : Get Ready to UP ALL NIGHT IN HONG KONG
vlive.english: We're going to repair it? - You're repairing it?

vlive.korean: [Q. 대기실에서 왜 수리영역 나형을 풀었나요?] 심심해서! [Q. Why did you work on the math questions of the SATs?] Bored! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [SF9] 나 기원전 00년생인데 0304형아즈 귀여워서 혼절해따,,(º﹃º):.♡* (SF9 talking about their cute episode)
vlive.english: [Q. Why did you work on the math questions of the SATs?] Bored!

examples.korean: The museum has been closed for renovation. 발음듣기 그 박물관은 수리를 위해 문을 닫았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The museum has been closed for renovation. 발음

examples.korean: They lacked the wherewithal to pay for the repairs. 발음듣기 그들은 수리비를 지불할 돈이 부족했다[없었다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They lacked the wherewithal to pay for the repairs. 발음

examples.korean: We’re having our car repaired. 발음듣기 우리 차는 수리 중이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We’re having our car repaired. 발음

examples.korean: Under the provisions of the lease, the tenant is responsible for repairs. 발음듣기 임대차 계약서 조항들에 따르면 세입자가 수리를 해야 할 책임이 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Under the provisions of the lease, the tenant is responsible for repairs. 발음

examples.korean: The house is in good repair. 발음듣기 그 집은 수리가 잘된 상태이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The house is in good repair. 발음
